name: Space Escape (Martin, Demy)
description:
WELCOME scoundrel!
You have just pulled off the most daring heist, and now you are on the run from the police.

Sadly all you got is this piece of space junk, so while zooming through the asteroid field you have to avoid the asteroids and ensure the piece of crap is still flying. Get through the asteroid field and keep your ship flying!

Move using WASD.
Activate/fix consoles by clicking them.
Leave bridge/flying mode using Space or Tab.
To quit the game use the trusted Alt+F4 or quit via the main menu.

How long will you last, and will you manage to get out of the asteroid field?

To play:
Unzip "SpaceEscape_windows.zip" at the desired location and start "SpaceEscape.exe"

Created by:
Demy @demypg - programming, game logic, controls, spawners
Martin @moeren  - 2d and 3d art, ui, shaders, lighting
